summary: Just a thing i realized
title: Just a thing i realized
body:
So,like i was thinking and i was like:

Harry Potter and Vision are the same by one thing..It blew my mind..They both have something very special that makes them recognizable and that is the lighting scar and the mind stone..

In,Infinity War Vision always got a surge from the stone,warning him aout the upcoming things that would happen.

As for,Harry..It always hurts when Voldemort was near or if it shows him visions of what Voldemort was doing

It’s weird to think about,I know..I thought i was stupid at first

summary:
HUMANS ARE FRIENDS NOT FOOD.
 POTTERVERSE ϟ OPEN PLAYBYS ϟ  JCINK PREMIUM
 These are members of an organization that functions...
caption:
HUMANS ARE FRIENDS NOT FOOD.

POTTERVERSE ϟ OPEN PLAYBYS ϟ  JCINK PREMIUM

These are members of an organization that functions like a half-way house for new vampires. These newbies are freshly dead, recently had to relinquish their wands, and are trying to master self-control and using their new iPhones. It’s a hard-knock life… er, undeath. Character concepts and playbys are flexible. Click HERE to learn more!

summary:
Out of boredom, for the next few days (today through Christmas) I wanna do some cool stuff with you guys! 
Send me requests for...
body:
Out of boredom, for the next few days (today through Christmas) I wanna do some cool stuff with you guys!

  • Send me requests for short little blurbs/drabbles
  • Or just asks in general
  • Tell me about your ocs/ask me about mine (I’d gladly share)
  • I can make modboards
  • Send me a short description of yourself (hobbies, personality, favorite type of music, etc) and I’ll compile a short playlist I think you’d like
  • We can talk about books/shows, and I can recommend some
  • Tell me about your holiday wishes, what are you hoping to get, what present are you excited to give, or of you don’t celebrate, how are you planning to relax?

Really, just interact with me, I’d love to chill with everyone, whether you’re bored like me or need someone to talk to during the holiday season

Tagging some people to spread this: @bravest-at-heart @gaypanda @causeimamerican @musicalytrashpanda

blog.name: rachelundefined
blog.title: RachelUndefined
blog.description:
Who am I? Can anyone really answer that question? I don't know who I am. I'm undefined.

What am I into? My biggest, but by no means only, passion is HP fanfics. My interests are many and varied, and my posts reflect my diversity.

Will our interests correspond? Only you can answer that question. Or will you, like myself, remain undefined?

tags: because i never know how that name is spelled
summary:
Harry: "Narcisa" or "Narcissa"?
Draco: Follow your heart
Harry: I don't want to misspell her name and being killed for it! Tell...
body:
Harry: "Narcisa" or "Narcissa"?
Draco: Follow your heart
Harry: I don't want to misspell her name and being killed for it! Tell me!
Draco: This is a task to see if you are a worthy boyfriend
Harry: I'll go with Mrs. Malfoy

dialogue.name: Harry
dialogue.label: Harry:
dialogue.phrase: I don't want to misspell her name and being killed for it! Tell me!

dialogue.name: Draco
dialogue.label: Draco:
dialogue.phrase: This is a task to see if you are a worthy boyfriend

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

summary:
BE ORIGINAL. BE ANYONE. BE CREATIVE.
 POTTERVERSE ϟ ADVANCED ϟ JCINK PREMIUM ϟ 14+ YEARS
 JACFC is active, welcoming, and the...
caption:
BE ORIGINAL. BE ANYONE. BE CREATIVE.

POTTERVERSE ϟ ADVANCED ϟ JCINK PREMIUM ϟ 14+ YEARS

JACFC is active, welcoming, and the perfect home for writers who love the Potterverse but also want creative freedom to explore and expand Rowling’s world. We’re currently in the midst of a series of SITE EVENTS: a mysterious sickness is affecting the magical ability of witches and wizards, and St. Mungo’s is hosting a charity gala to raise money to research, produce, and provide the cure.

summary: Surprise Present
title: Surprise Present
description:
by bloop18

Harry has never gotten over the delight of getting gifts at Christmas, but when someone gives him the Horcruxes he thought he’d destroyed twenty years earlier, he isn’t sure he gets the joke.

blog.name: ao3feed-wolfstar
blog.title: remus x sirius ao3 feed
blog.description: (I don't actually read all these fics or choose what comes on the blog, it's literally just a feed of the ao3 ship tag sorry)

summary: Need You Tonight
title: Need You Tonight
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2V2WTZS

by Samunderthelights

Remus and his friends are in their final year at Hogwarts, and he is growing more anxious about leaving behind everything he has ever known. About having to face the world alone. But after opening up to Sirius about his fears, his best friend promises him that he will always be there for him. And when the two friends start sharing a bed, their friendship soon turns into something more.

Words: 2864, Chapters: 1/7, Language: English

  • Rating: Explicit

by Samunderthelights

Remus and his friends are in their final year at Hogwarts, and he is growing more anxious about leaving behind everything he has ever known. About having to face the world alone. But after opening up to Sirius about his fears, his best friend promises him that he will always be there for him. And when the two friends start sharing a bed, their friendship soon turns into something more.

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

blog.name: nargle-impeachment-committee
blog.title: I Suspect Nargles are Behind it
blog.description: Let’s face it, this blog isn’t NEARLY as organized as I had planned, but it’s still a great place for Harry Potter stuff, Taylor Swift stuff, ASOUE, coding resources, the occasional rant...

summary: “We’ll be at Hogwarts in ten minutes,” said Professor Lupin. “Are you all right, Harry?“  Harry didn’t ask how Professor Lupin...
body:
“We’ll be at Hogwarts in ten minutes,” said Professor Lupin. “Are you all right, Harry?“  Harry didn’t ask how Professor Lupin knew his name.

Okay Harry dear let me tell you how he knew your name:

  • He bought you your first knit sweater, it was red because he knew red brought out your mother’s eyes.
  • He was there when you got sick for the first time. He comforted your parents because he was the first person they called. “Moony come here right this second, Lily’s freaking out”
  • During your first winter you liked being in his arms the best because he was warmer than the other Marauders
  • He took care of you so many times when mama and dada were having a date night
  • You were the only thing that made him as happy as chocolate after a particularly rough full moon
  • You liked to ran your little hands over his big scars, you were the second person he didn’t mind doing that. Sirius was the first
  • You made him smile even though there was a war going on and there wasn’t much to be happy about
  • All he wanted was you after he lost it all, he was denied that right.
  • He thought about you and all his friends on full moons, how all of them sat on the living room floor of the Potters and played with you, no one had died or betrayed each other
  • He knew your name Harry, because the moment he opened his eyes in that compartment, he thought James was sitting across him and they were back in their 3rd year.
  • He knew who you were because when he looked into your eyes to say “sit still” he saw Lily Evans’ eyes.
  • He knew your name, Harry, because you were all he had left as a reminder that everything they went through with Marauders were real.
  • And the worst part is you knew him,too. You loved him at one point and now you didn’t even recognize him.
